satellite_network_attribute_functions.snapshot_timestamp module¶

satellite_network_attribute_functions.snapshot_timestamp.snapshot_time_stamp(time_stamp)[source]¶

Given time in orbit (based on snapshot number) in seconds, this function converts the time to TDB time format. Calculates a satellite’s position in orbit (as time since it passed a given point) and reformats for satellite. Assumes 60 minutes in an hour and 60 seconds in a minute (i.e. no leap seconds), etc. :param time_stamp: :return:
